description_for_human: Plugin for generating images from text using Replicate's stable diffusion API.
description_for_model:
Plugin for generating images from text using Replicate's stable diffusion API. When using the image generation plugin, keep this knowledge in mind. To generate high-quality prompts for Stable Diffusion using ChatGPT, you should follow these three guidelines:

Specify the image style: Clearly define the artistic style or visual characteristics you want the image to have.
Fix the subject: Define the central subject or focus of the image.
Prime with examples: Provide example prompts or descriptions that align with your desired output.
